name: cuemate-desktop-client
description: CueMate Desktop Client - Real-time voice interview assistant
author: CueMate Team

scripts.build: pnpm typecheck && pnpm build:native && pnpm build:main && pnpm build:renderer
scripts.build:native: CXXFLAGS='-arch arm64' LDFLAGS='-arch arm64' node-gyp rebuild --arch=arm64 --directory=src/main/native/screen_capture_audio && CXXFLAGS='-arch arm64' LDFLAGS='-arch arm64' node-gyp rebuild --arch=arm64 --directory=src/main/native/speech_recognition
scripts.build:native:electron: ELECTRON_VERSION="$(node -p "require('electron/package.json').version")" && CXXFLAGS='-arch arm64' LDFLAGS='-arch arm64' node-gyp rebuild --arch=arm64 --runtime=electron --target=$ELECTRON_VERSION --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers --directory=src/main/native/screen_capture_audio && CXXFLAGS='-arch arm64' LDFLAGS='-arch arm64' node-gyp rebuild --arch=arm64 --runtime=electron --target=$ELECTRON_VERSION --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers --directory=src/main/native/speech_recognition
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently --names "VITE,ELECTRON" "pnpm dev" "pnpm build:native:electron && pnpm build:main && pnpm electron" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.dev:mac-app: pnpm build && electron-builder --mac --dir --publish=never && APP="$(ls -d release/mac*/CueMate.app | head -n 1)" && echo $APP && open "$APP"

extendInfo.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: CueMate 需要访问麦克风进行语音识别测试
extendInfo.NSScreenCaptureDescription: CueMate 需要屏幕录制权限来捕获系统音频扬声器输出进行扬声器测试
extendInfo.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: CueMate 需要语音识别权限以将语音转为文本
extendInfo.NSCameraUsageDescription: CueMate 需要访问摄像头以进行视频或连续互通相机功能
